name: Blaze Rose
description:
Blaze Rose is a final work for the digital games course that I recently finished
It's a Shmup 2d illustrated in vector and programmed on Construct 2.
I intend to finish it completely because, at the moment, Blaze Rose was produced only
as a prototype and for this reason, there are still bugs and missing items like new levels and scores, however, nothing that would harm the gameplay.

The musics used on game is:

EnV - The Sixth - Rise
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DM-2hgS9YTE

Big Giant Circles - The Glory Days - Chipzeal
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9OquWmdUYXw
